Articles.Content:
Have brush, will paint.

I consider the one of Jeb to be utterly hideous, and the other one to have potential if I were to do it properly on the computer, rather than by hand with watercolour.

Comments and feedback welcome.

Second one.

Well, i feel like writing something, so here goes.

Jeb the killer.

By; The RewDew

I awoke somewhere damp and cold, the air sticking to my lungs and coating them in an unforgettable feeling of fear. As i come to realize that I can't remember how i got here, i open my eyes to see the faint figure of a kerbal in front of me. Unable to see him, or hear him I grab at something in the dark at what appears to be a lantern, and flick the small switch on the front. As the light goes on I blinded for an instant at how bright it is, but when i look up to where i saw the kerbal sitting before, it was not there.

"Go to space...." I hear in a faint whisper from the dark corridor to my left. "Go to space, and it will be all over"

"Who's there?!" i try to call, but barely get out a whisper. "Where am i?"

I try to get up, but i fall back down again, my leg stinging as if someone had shoved a large piece of metal through it. I look down at my leg to see that there was a large splinter of wood, sticking out of the side with a large amount of dried blood around it. I make a grab for it, but i could not reach it, as if it were just at the edge of my fingers.

"Go to space..." i hear again. but louder this time, as if someone were speaking it softly into my ear to put me to sleep.

I lift the lamp to see who was there, but again, no one was there.

I try again to get back up again, leaning mostly on my other foot, and hobbled down the dark corridor where the voices came from.

"Go to space." the voice said again, and louder than before. "go to space" And there was a cold feel down my neck and on my shoulder. I turned around and tried to hit it with the lantern, but instead it flew out of my hand and broke on the ground.

"No!" i tried to yell, but again my voices was nothing more but a whisper in an endless sea of darkness.

I tried to look around, for another source of light, and saw one down the corridor i was already heading in. but my way was blocked by what looked like a kerbal, or at least what was left of one after the years of decay and rot had gotten to it. for it had eyes that looked as if they had not moved with the flicker of life in a long time, and the mouth of which had not smiled in a long time.

"Go to space" the figure said, slowly sliding towards me along the floor as if it were to attack me.

I turn, ready to run for any kind of shelter or hiding spot away from that... that thing. i saw a light flicker down the end of the corridor and there was a chair there, behind a large metal hatch. i look behind and it's still chasing me, not moving it's feet. just sliding, passing through anything that would block it's way.

"Go to space." it said, in a horrid demented tone, but without moving it's lifeless lips.

I hobble my way down to the chair, and slam the door shut, and the creature stopped.

"Go to space" i heard it say for the last time, as it reached over and pressed a button. and I was lost to the stars.

THE END

Edited June 28, 2013 by rewdew2
Oh bother, i killed the thread... i seem to do that alot.

You're not the only one.

It wasn't you!

It was Jeb. The Killer.
